mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video ( video_id, artist_id, title, description, is_exclusive, views, likes, comments_count, category_id, media_url ) VALUES ( video_seq.NEXTVAL, #{artistId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{title}, #{description}, #{isExclusive, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{views, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{likes, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{commentsCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{categoryId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mediaUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
